pr_title: [TE] only merge same trend in ChildKeepingMerge

timeline.message: [TE] only merge same trend in ChildKeepingMerge

timeline.bodyText: some anomalies don't have the pattern key. in that case, should it be deducted from the current and the baseline?
timeline.author: jihaozh

replies.bodyText: I think that a few rule-based detectors don't fill out the baseline value of MergedAnomalyResult, ThresholdRuleDetector for instance, so comparing them may not work for all detectors either.
replies.author: vincentchenjl
